fields.Title: DOOMED / CENTRAL FURNACE
fields.Description: This is an industrial oven on the first floor of Doomed. You can interact with it and contact Dicemaker.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "A thick layer of coal dust covers t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A thick layer of coal dust covers the furnace, colouring it pitch-black.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Three dangerous stripes appear onto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Three dangerous stripes appear onto your cheeks, telling stories of your wild soul.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "A hollow ring echoes through the fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A hollow ring echoes through the furnace. Your toe hurts.

fields.Title: You: "Yell "Hello!" into the furnace."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yell "Hello!" into the furnace.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And *this* protects you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And *this* protects you?"

fields.Title: You: "Wipe it clean."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wipe it clean.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm, maybe you should let your voi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, maybe you should let your voice rest, officer. Try again later."

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "The chatter from the chimney contin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The chatter from the chimney continue on as before. You seem to have made no impression on whatever's *up there*.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not sure, Kim... but I think I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure, Kim... but I think I can hear someone talking upstairs."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Or maybe you're just hungover again..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Or maybe you're just hungover again.

fields.Title: You: "Smear your hands with coal."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smear your hands with coal.

fields.Title: You: "No, let's not express ourselves. Le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, let's not express ourselves. Let's just wipe our hands clean on our pants.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please wipe your face clean, offic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please wipe your face clean, officer."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing?" the lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you doing?" the lieutenant asks when he sees you climb half-way inside the furnace.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Could it be psychological? Because..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Could it be psychological? Because your physical health is fine.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you," the lieutenant nods. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you," the lieutenant nods. "So, where were we?" He turns back to the furnace.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: ""Hello?" you hear a woman's voice a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello?" you hear a woman's voice answer.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Looks like this furnace has a face..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like this furnace has a face and it's a face of agony.

fields.Title: Authority: "You can feel your cheeks turn red u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can feel your cheeks turn red under the lieutenant's gaze -- you look like a kid, not a police officer. Even the war-paint can't conceal the embarrassment.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should ask the lady in the book..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should ask the lady in the bookstore what's going on with these curtains."

fields.Title: You: ""It gives me confidence and that's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It gives me confidence and that's all that matters, Kim."

fields.Title: You: "I'm getting carbon monoxide poisoni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm getting carbon monoxide poisoning.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Another pathetic yelp sounds off in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another pathetic yelp sounds off into the vast darkness of the chimney. You're a little embarrassed you produced it.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Something *breaks loose* in you. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something *breaks loose* in you. A mighty bellow echoes throughout the chimney's depths. The chatter of tiny voices above suddenly cease. Then...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, really?" He looks up at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, really?" He looks up at the ceiling. "Maybe it's coming from behind those safety curtains we saw upstairs?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, really?" He looks up at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, really?" He looks up at the ceiling. "We should investigate, see if someone's upstairs."

fields.Title: Half Light: "And it's a woman! Of course! The ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And it's a woman! Of course! The malicious entities are *always* women.

fields.Title: You: "What's happening?!"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's happening?!

fields.Title: You: "I'm hallucinating..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm hallucinating...

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, really?" The lieutenant soun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, really?" The lieutenant sounds concerned. "Take your head out of the chimney, please. It's not safe."

fields.Title: Volition: "This sounded real, not imagined."
fields.Dialogue Text: This sounded real, not imagined.

fields.Title: You: "Hadramut Karzai! Smear your cheeks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hadramut Karzai! Smear your cheeks black with coal.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like it. Looks like an old c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like it. Looks like an old central furnace used to heat the building. It's connected to the chimney..." He opens the door and gingerly peeks inside.

fields.Title: You: ""This is the police! Who's there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the police! Who's there?"
fields.Alternate1: "This is the Remote Viewers Division! Identify yourself!"

fields.Title: Authority: "These three stripes give you streng..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These three stripes give you strength in this dangerous realm. It would be foolish to remove them.

fields.Title: You: ""Those voices I heard... Maybe it's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those voices I heard... Maybe it's the malignant Entity? Plaisance said it lives in a chimney."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["doomed.furnace_heard_voices"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.doomed_investigation"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.doomed_investigation_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["doomed.plaisance_kim_suggested_returning_to_furnace"] == false

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "Maybe it's coming from behind those..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's coming from behind those safety curtains you saw upstairs? You should investigate...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant seems relieved as we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant seems relieved as well.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Just pointing out -- this is *not*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just pointing out -- this is *not* traditional Semenese war-paint. No idea where you got it.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "It's dark and grimy here. In the da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's dark and grimy here. In the darkness, you can hear *chatter*. It's coming from above. A voice -- or several voices -- talking to each other, near the smoke chamber upstairs.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Then what was the chatter you heard..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Then what was the chatter you heard?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yes, how grown-up. The furnace agre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, how grown-up. The furnace agrees.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Yes, it was," the lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Yes, it was," the lieutenant nods, before turning back to the furnace.

fields.Title: You: ""Hello! Are you there? Speak to me!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello! Are you there? Speak to me!"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You muster all your strength and ye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You muster all your strength and yell...

fields.Title: You: ""We're exploring this dark place an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're exploring this dark place and I need the protection my war-paint affords."

fields.Title: You: ""*This* is traditional war-paint. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*This* is traditional war-paint. It will grant me safe passage with the spirits that guard this place."

fields.Title: Central Furnace: ""Hello! Did you say anything?" Ther..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello! Did you say anything?" There's a pause. "I can't hear you, please come upstairs! There's a safety curtain on the second floor, I'll open it!"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You've awakened the entity!"
fields.Dialogue Text: You've awakened the entity!

fields.Title: You: ""I am the reincarnation of an ancie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am the reincarnation of an ancient Iilmaraan warrior."

fields.Title: You: ""I summon the ghost of this Doomed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I summon the ghost of this Doomed Commercial Area. Now begone, vile succubus!"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.doomed_investigation"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.doomed_investigation_done"] == false  and  Variable["doomed.furnace_halflight_succubus"] == true

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It feels safe to know that the lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It feels safe to know that the lieutenant's got your back, now and always.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "Maybe it's coming from somewhere up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's coming from somewhere upstairs? You should investigate...

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "The echo is so prominent, it's impo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The echo is so prominent, it's impossible to discern what the voices are saying. Or what's producing them.

fields.Title: You: "Look inside the furnace."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look inside the furnace.

fields.Title: You: "Kick it with your foot."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kick it with your foot.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Always has to be the sceptic, this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Always has to be the sceptic, this man...

fields.Title: You: ""He... he... hekkhhhh...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He... he... hekkhhhh..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What... what are you doing?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What... what are you doing?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one has used it in ages... No s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one has used it in ages... No signs of any recent fire, only dead rats."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "No, you're a proud warrior, keep it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, you're a proud warrior, keep it.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm hallucinating.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm hallucinating."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm hallucinating. Or maybe it's the Entity..."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Maybe you could *paint* something w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe you could *paint* something with this coal? Leave a cave painting for future archaeologists... no, that would be stupid.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "A thick layer of coal dust covers t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A thick layer of coal dust covers the furnace, colouring it pitch-black.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You feel the spirit of Ramout Karza..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel the spirit of Ramout Karzai, ancient hero of Graad, pulsing through you. All that's left is to cover your face in war-paint.

fields.Title: You: ""I hear the murderer of the hanged..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hear the murderer of the hanged man talking."

fields.Title: Volition: "This sounded real, not imagined."
fields.Dialogue Text: This sounded real, not imagined.

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "Then again -- maybe it's worth actu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Then again -- maybe it's worth actually trying something *up there*?

fields.Title: Authority: "What a proud warrior! This is how t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a proud warrior! This is how the hunted becomes the hunter in this dark dangerous place.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a low rumble upstairs -- t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a low rumble upstairs -- the sound of a curtain being pulled aside.

fields.Title: Volition: "A lifetime of smoking and drinking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A lifetime of smoking and drinking will do that to you.

fields.Title: You: "I hear the murderer of the hanged m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I hear the murderer of the hanged man talking.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, what is this thing? Is it a f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, what is this thing? Is it a furnace?!"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Still, it's good you have this dirt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still, it's good you have this dirt on you. Real men wear *coal* for make-up.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, sure. Go ahead." He stubborn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, sure. Go ahead." He stubbornly looks away from you and the furnace.

fields.Title: You: ""I summon the ghost of this Doomed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I summon the ghost of this Doomed Commercial Area. Answer me, spirit!"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.doomed_investigation"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.doomed_investigation_done"] == false  and  Variable["doomed.furnace_halflight_succubus"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right, the rooms do look li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, the rooms do look like they're connected. But *malignant Entities* don't exist -- at least not the *supra-natural* kind."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Your dehydrated, hungover throat ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your dehydrated, hungover throat can produce little more than a dry croak.
fields.Alternate1: Your throat can produce little more than a dry croak. Awkward, since you already had a drink...

fields.Title: Central Furnace: "A lush layer of coal now covers you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A lush layer of coal now covers your skin, sinking into the wrinkles. Your hands look ancient.

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing!" (Wipe your face clean.)..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing!" (Wipe your face clean.) "Sorry, that was stupid."

fields.Title: You: "Don't wipe it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't wipe it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods, then points up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods, then points upstairs. "After you, officer."
